name: Appergy
description:
The founders of Appergy set up the company in London in 2012 to provide advice on mobile strategy to professional services organizations including law firms, accounting firms, associations, networks and membership organizations. Appergy is the sister company of long-established YARG Ltd. We aim to be the partner of choice for innovative professional services organizations that are extending their brands and services to the mobile channel.
With huge growth in the use of smartphones among professional organizations' clients and members, all firms and associations should be thinking about mobile. Our expertise and product will enable you to publish information about your people and services to your increasingly moble clients' and members' smartphones. In a competitive market, we can help you keep your brand top of mind among your clients and members. We provide high quality iPhone, iPad, Android and BlackBerry app solutions to many of the world's largest professional services organizations.
